title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 86.10 - Limitations on certain acquisitions of control of stock-form thrift institutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 86.10 - Limitations on certain acquisitions of control of stock-form thrift institutions

State Regulations

An organization certificate of a converting thrift may
contain provisions, the effect of which would be to prohibit the acquisition of
control of the converted stock-form thrift institution for a period not
exceeding three years from the effective date of the conversion from mutual to
stock-form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
86.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
